DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to see whether turmeric can be effective in treatment of pruritus in hemodialysis patients.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Turmeric on Pruritus in Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: pruritus is a common in hemodialysis patients and many treatment recommended for it . as turmeric has anti-inflammatory , anti-cytokine and anti-oxidant effect it may effective in treatment of uremic pruritus. thus we compared turmeric with placebo in this study
DOC.criteria: Hemodialysis for more than 3 months More than 18 years old Pruritus Use other treatment for pruritus
